subtask.title: FreshService API Integration
subtask.objective: Establish secure communication between the AI agent and FreshService instances.
subtask.scope: Create Python scripts to handle authentication (instance URL, API key), ticket creation/updating, and status tracking via REST API.

verification.completion_summary: Theoretical understanding of FreshService API integration was achieved, but no concrete Python scripts or implementation details were produced.

covered_aspects: Understanding of FreshService as an ITSM platform
missing_aspects: Implementation of Python scripts for authentication/ticket handling
Specific API endpoint details for ticket creation/updating
Code examples for status tracking mechanisms

missing_requirements: Actual Python script development for API interactions
Detailed documentation of specific API endpoints
